com.estimote.sdk

Class EstimoteSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.sdk.EstimoteSDK

  • public class EstimoteSDK
extends java.lang.Object
    The EstimoteSDK class contains static functions that handle global configuration for the Estimote SDK.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String VERSION
      Version of Estimote SDK for Android.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context applicationContext,
                              java.lang.String appId,
                              java.lang.String appToken)
        Sets App ID and App Token, enabling communication with the Estimote Cloud API. You can find your API App ID and API App Token in the Apps section of the Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - Android application context.
        appId - Application ID.
        appToken - Application token.

      • enableDebugLogging

        public static void enableDebugLogging(boolean enableDebugLogging)
        Enables debug logging of the Estimote SDK.
        Parameters:
        enableDebugLogging - Whether enable debug logging.

      • enableMonitoringAnalytics

        public static void enableMonitoringAnalytics(boolean enable)
        Enables analytics requests on Enter/Exit monitoring events. Analytics data is collected in the Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        enable - flag indicating if analytics for monitoring should be enabled

      • enableRangingAnalytics

        public static void enableRangingAnalytics(boolean enable)
        Enables analytics requests for ranging events. Information about beacons and their Proximity is collected in the Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        enable - flag indicating if analytics for ranging should be enabled

      • enableGpsPositioningForAnalytics

        public static void enableGpsPositioningForAnalytics(boolean enable)
        When GPS Positioning is turned on analytics events contains information about GPS Location.
        Parameters:
        enable - flag indicating if GPS Positioning should be enabled

      • setGoogleApiKey

        public static void setGoogleApiKey(java.lang.String key)
        Setups Google API key for resolving EIDs in Google cloud.
        Parameters:
        key - pregenerated user API key

      • isMonitoringAnalyticsEnabled

        public static boolean isMonitoringAnalyticsEnabled()
        Indicates current state of monitoring analytics.
        Returns:
        flag that indicates if analytics is enabled

      • isRangingAnalyticsEnabled

        public static boolean isRangingAnalyticsEnabled()
        Indicates current state of ranging analytics.
        Returns:
        flag that indicates if analytics is enabled

      • isGpsPositionAnalyticsEnabled

        public static boolean isGpsPositionAnalyticsEnabled()
        Indicates current state of gps positioning analytics
        Returns:
        flag that indicates if analytics is enabled
